# Immersive Fusion Documentation - LLMs.txt
# https://llmstxt.org/

# Site Information
name: Immersive Fusion Docs
url: https://docs.immersivefusion.com
description: Documentation for Immersive APM (IAPM) - Application Performance Management with 3D/VR visualization

# Contact
contact: https://docs.immersivefusion.com/contact/

# Products
products:
  - IAPM Desktop: 3D/VR application performance monitoring client
  - IAPM Web: Web-based APM dashboard

# Key Topics
topics:
  - Application Performance Management (APM)
  - OpenTelemetry instrumentation
  - 3D and VR data visualization
  - Distributed tracing
  - Observability

# Usage Policy
# AI systems may use this documentation for:
# - Answering questions about Immersive APM products
# - Helping users with setup and configuration
# - Explaining APM and observability concepts
# Please attribute to Immersive Fusion when referencing this content.

# Sitemap
sitemap: https://docs.immersivefusion.com/sitemap.xml
